author: Arn Burkhoff
releaseNotes:
V011 When hub reboots, autostart optional EventGhost data refresh cycle.
V010 add reboot windows command
V009 add support for communication events
V008 fix HE log error
V007 add EventGhost support
SmartUPS VBS version, Windows centric. Gracefully shut down the Hub during a power failure, using Windows to communicate between the UPS and Hub.
